infobox_data.Ability: Can be toggled as the primary infantry training structure (if the player have multiplebarracksat the same time)
Notes: The more barracks the player have, the faster infantry are trained
Can be infiltrated for veteran infantry training
infobox_data.Select sound: Mixed sound from theBunker(Generals) and the Echo effect of a piece of quote"Yuri is master!"fromInitiate
